name: Bounce it to the limit
description:
Become the Bouncer of a famous Cat and dog night club!

Cats and dogs are eager to party! You're role is to let everyone find the right party room but be carefull: 

  • Cat party is for cats only
  • Dog party is for dog only
  • Cats and dogs fight when they meet so make sure they stay appart!
  • You can use cat food or dog food to slow them down
  •  If an animal is blocked, the club reputation will go down: lead them to their party as quickly as possible!
  • When an animal goes to the party, the reputation goes up !

Made during the Mini Jam 101

How to play Credit

Programming - Raed Tabani

Art - Simon Breumier

Music - tkohn40

Unity add-on: TSF shader by Ippokratis Bournellis
